channel.title: How do u make ur server run after u put in ur username?
channel.description: can u halp me at all, well............. i want to get into dragon-history and it says after i click enter on the log in page it says error connecting to the server any help of how to get into the game i think its like u gotta change the ip but how do i do that if im correct??

item.title: How do u make ur server run after u put in ur username?
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

if your Hosting the Server do the Following Steps!

1. Open Your Client Folder and find a File Called GUI.java (Make sure it's a java file) 2. Open and search for something like this (dragon) or (no-ip) and replave the whole IP with This "127.0.0.1" 3. If you couldnt find the ip try 1 of these 0.0.0.0 or the same 127.0.0.1 or 127.0.0.0 since some people do make mistakes.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make ur server run after u put in ur username?
